summary: A Django contrib package that implements a flashâ€‘messaging framework, exposing an API to queue messages, a context processor to make pending messages available in templates, middleware that loads and persists messages during the request/response cycle, utilities for mapping message levels to CSS classes, and a view mixin that automatically adds success notifications after successful form handling.
business_intent: Enable web applications to deliver transient user notifications (e.g., success, error, info messages) in a consistent, reusable way without manual session handling.
